articles.title: S&P 500 futures are slightly higher after Monday’s sharp sell-off: Live updates - CNBC
articles.description: The Nasdaq Composite slid more than 3% in Monday's trading as a slate of AI-related plays, including chip darling Nvidia, tanked.
articles.content: S&P 500 futures ticked higher early Tuesday, following a sell-off fueled by worries over the emergence of Chinese startup DeepSeek and its greater implications for the artificial intelligence tra… [+1969 chars]
